name: Red and Blue (itch) (Vishal Parab)
description:
Just tap and the bar will rotate.

Make the dots with the same color touch each other and score a point.
Don't blink as the game gets faster and more interesting.
Collect the stars for 5 points, but obviously, greater points require greater risk.
Put up a good score on the leaderboard and the "Bragging Rights" are yours.

Challenge your friends to be at the top of the leaderboard and May the "Dots" be with you.
